content.description:
Climb the leftmost line on the face with three quickdraws to a top anchor.

The route stays shaded for much of the day.

Be careful lowering, since it's easy to take a swing off the left side of the boulder!
content.protection: 3 quickdraws and a two bolt anchor on top.
content.location: There are now four routes on the Slab Boulder. This climb is the leftmost (easternmost) route.

content.description:
Climb the 3rd route from the left on a face with three quickdraws to a top anchor.

The route stays shaded for much of the day.
content.protection: 3 quickdraws and a two bolt anchor on top.
content.location: There are now four routes on the Slab Boulder. All range in difficulty from 5.8-5.11.Â  This is the third route from the left.

content.description:
Climb the second route from the left with four quickdraws to a top anchor.

The route stays shaded for much of the day.
content.protection: 4 quickdraws and a two bolt anchor on top.
content.location: There are now four routes on the Slab Boulder. All range in difficulty from 5.8-5.11. This route is the 2nd route from the left (east).

content.description:
Climb the route fartherest right on the boulder with three quickdraws to a top anchor.

The route stays shaded for much of the day.
content.protection: 3 quickdraws and a two bolt anchor on top.
content.location: There are now four routes on the Sport Boulder. All range from 5.8-5.11 but can be slippery because of lichen. This climb is the rightmost (westernmost) route.
